attributes.action: Stop the law changing to dog's having to wear a mussel and having to get insurance and papers for every dog !!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is unfair on dogs and also owners. why should a well trained dog and a good owner have to put a mussel on there dog just to please the law. its ridiculous. also why should we pay more money to get a different insurance on a dog as well as getting papers?? if dogs are brought up correctly and are trained like dogs should be then why change there routine. not every dog is nasty, there are more trained, nice dogs then vicious ones, i think this is very unfair

rejection.details: Please change your reference to "mussels" (a kind of seafood) - do you mean "muzzles"?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
